sentences.sContent: As much as I love my job as a newspaper reporter, I will never work myself into the ground, literally or figuratively.
sentences.sContent_eng: As much as I love my job as a newspaper reporter, I will never work myself into the ground, literally or figuratively.
sentences.sCn: 尽管我热爱我的工作——报社记者，但我绝不会让自己因为工作把自己送入“坟墓”里面，不管是字面上还是比喻。
